response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to me and I believe it would be equally beneficial for you. Considering its unique features and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I am extending an offer to sell it to you at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its intrinsic worth, making it a compelling investment for you. I trust that this proposal aligns with your interests and budget. If you're interested in proceeding, please let me know, and we can discuss further details.", "product_price": 950000}
